documents.document: RT @MCUc2c: Our new episode is live! We go back to the early days and talk about the First Avenger...Captain America! Take a listen to see
Its been another one of those weeks. #DoctorWho https://t.co/wHcpirEYFZ
@jamesthewhovian Favourite Doctor - Thirteen Favourite Companion - Amy Favourite Villain - Mondasian Cyberman Favourite Season - Classic: 4, New: 12

@sapphicsensate @Tardis_Ladylord @SafeSpaceDrWho @TheFansOfWho @dwfan89 @DrOho @mrsjmccrimmon @Positive_Who @WhoPositivity @PositiveWhovian @geoffcockwill That's very kind of you! And right back at you!
@SafeSpaceDrWho Rose!!
Here is how I would rate each episode in series 12!! Please remember that this is just my opinion and that opinions are not facts! #DoctorWho https://t.co/0WDm0G7Bfj
You're too kind! Thanks so much! https://t.co/NjrMcX2reT

@soundsmythprod Season 7 is one of my favourites, some really fantastic eps there. Same, it has such a timeless feel about it which I love! Also when you do get round to watching again be sure not to forget the two movies!
@soundsmythprod Definitely The X Files. Its one of the best shows ever made!
@mrsjmccrimmon Aw, thank you so much, you are very kind! Also if you haven't, be sure to follow @mrsjmccrimmon, they are one of the best on Twitter!
RT @TimelessOwen: "Rose, before I go, I just want to tell you, you were fantastic. Absolutely fantastic. And do you know what? So was I."

@DrOho @MCUc2c Oh yes, I agree with you, it is a lot of fun. I mean, when I first watched these films, the only knowledge I had was on spiderman . Just wait until you get to phase 2, that's where things really start to unfold and grow!!

@MCUc2c Another great podcast! I quite enjoyed Thor. It may not be my favourite, however, it does have a lot of great moments and heaps of fantastic characters. Looking forward to the next one! Also, you don't know what the Infinity Gauntlet is? For shame

I can't believe it's been a whole year since I made and posted my first two artworks! I still have a long way to go and a lot of things to learn, but I'm happy with how far I've come along in such a short amount of time! I cant believe that its been 16 years since Doctor Who landed back on our screens. Ive been here since I was 6 and Ive been travelling through time and space ever since! Thanks for taking me on the trip of a lifetime!! #DoctorWho https://t.co/LJsgACqwyT
